name: Duck Hunter: Call of the Wild
name_original: Duck Hunter: Call of the Wild
description:
Duck Hunter : Call of the Wild is a game that I've done, within a week, for a school project.

The goal was to recreate an old gameplay (here, Duck Hunt) and make that old gameplay J U I C Y. So here's my take on "juicy Duck Hunt".

Enjoy !

Side note : When a completing a run, you'll have to restart the game, if you want to play again.
